    • Method Detail

      • invoke

        public void invoke(long errinfo,
          long private_info,
          long cb)
        Description copied from interface: CLContextCallback
        Invoked to report information on errors during context creation as well as errors that occur at runtime.
        Specified by:
        invoke in interface CLContextCallback
        Parameters:
        errinfo - a pointer to an error string
        private_info - a pointer to binary data that is returned by the OpenCL implementation that can be used to log additional information helpful in debugging the error.
        cb - the number of bytes in the private_info pointer

      • invoke

        public void invoke(java.nio.ByteBuffer errinfo,
          java.nio.ByteBuffer private_info)
        Alternative version that accepts a buffer.

      • invoke

        public void invoke(java.lang.String errinfo,
          java.nio.ByteBuffer private_info)
        Description copied from interface: CLContextCallback.Str
        Invoked to report information on errors during context creation as well as errors that occur at runtime.
        Specified by:
        invoke in interface CLContextCallback.Str
        Parameters:
        errinfo - an error string
        private_info - binary data that is returned by the OpenCL implementation that can be used to log additional information helpful in debugging the error. May be null.
